name: Metallurgy
description: A vertically scrolling steampunk rogue-like with a novel crafting/invention mechanic. Play as Icarus as he learns to craft his own wings and challenge the skies! Craft your own weapons and upgrades by learning from your environment, inventing all kinds of gadgets and gizmos to protect yourself. Fight a plethora of enemies as you slowly make your way to the mysterious entity that lurks at the top!
